Toxic Saliva.name: Toxic Saliva
Toxic Saliva.fullText:
Kapak Draconian Racial Utility Toxic Saliva

You lick your weapon, coating it in venom.

Encounter      Poison
Minor Action      Personal

Target: An axe, heavy blade, light blade, pick, or spear, or an arrow or crossbow bolt.

Effect: Your next successful weapon attack with the target also deals 1d6 poison damage and the target is slowed (save ends).
    Level 11: 2d6 poison damage.
    Level 21: 3d6 poison damage.

  First Failed Saving Throw: The target is instead immobilized (save ends).


Published in Dragon Magazine 421.
Toxic Saliva.flavor: You lick your weapon, coating it in venom.

Acidic Revenge.name: Acidic Revenge
Acidic Revenge.fullText:
Kapak Draconian Racial Attack Acidic Revenge

When you die, acid explodes from your corpse.

Daily      Acid
Immediate Reaction      Close burst 2

Trigger: You die.

Target: Each creature in the burst

Attack: Strength, Constitution, or Dexterity vs. Reflex. You gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll.
    Level 11: The bonus increases to +4.
    Level 21: The bonus increases to +6.

Hit: 1d8 + Constitution modifier acid damage, and ongoing 5 acid damage (save ends).
    Level 11: 2d8 + Constitution modifier acid damage, and ongoing 10 acid damage (save ends).
    Level 21: 3d8 + Constitution modifier acid damage, and ongoing 15 acid damage (save ends).


Published in Dragon Magazine 421.
Acidic Revenge.flavor: When you die, acid explodes from your corpse.
Acidic Revenge.attack:
Strength, Constitution, or Dexterity vs. Reflex. You gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll.
    Level 11: The bonus increases to +4.
    Level 21: The bonus increases to +6.

1d8 + Constitution modifier acid damage, and ongoing 5 acid damage (save ends).
    Level 11: 2d8 + Constitution modifier acid damage, and ongoing 10 acid damage (save ends).
    Level 21: 3d8 + Constitution modifier acid damage, and ongoing 15 acid damage (save ends).
